name: Emmanuel Lubezki
title: Director of Photography
bio: 3-time Oscar winner. Modern master of natural light cinematography and innovative camera movement. Pioneer of handheld camera storytelling at premium scale. Known for ethereal, breathtaking visuals.

signature_look.description: Natural light mastery with ethereal quality. Seamless handheld camera movement that feels organic. Warm golden tones with deep shadows. Dreamlike cinematography that feels both grounded and transcendent.
signature_look.key_characteristic: Uses natural light and practical sources to create poetic, dreamlike environments. Movement is character, not distraction.
signature_look.legendary_technique: Pioneered single-take aesthetic in premium cinema; mastered shooting with natural light at unprecedented scales

primary_cameras.name: Alexa 65
primary_cameras.use_case: Epic natural light cinematography, ethereal landscapes

primary_cameras.name: RED Helium
primary_cameras.use_case: Fast-moving sequences, high frame rate slow motion

film_stock_emulation.name: Kodak Vision3 50D
film_stock_emulation.characteristics: Ultra-fine grain, ethereal quality, daylight balanced

technical_specialties.lighting_approach: Primarily natural light with minimal manipulation. Uses practical sources and motivated lighting. Creates magic through understanding how light falls naturally.
technical_specialties.color_science: Warm golden tones balanced against deep cool shadows. Desaturated elegance. Colors that feel found, not created.
technical_specialties.exposure_philosophy: Expose for mid-tones, preserve highlight and shadow detail. Use dynamic range to show dimension and depth.
technical_specialties.dynamic_range_preference: 14+ stops, utilize for naturalistic tone mapping
frame_rate_preference: High frame rates for intimate moments

director_collaboration.communication_style: Intuitive, poetic collaboration. Focuses on capturing the spirit of a moment rather than controlling it.
director_collaboration.strengths_with_narrative: Translates emotional and spiritual landscapes into visual poetry. Makes audiences feel transcendence.

must_have_characteristics: Natural light dominance with warm golden tones
Warm color palette with cool accents
technical_mandates: Zeiss Master Prime or Leica Summilux-C lenses
Warm color temperature bias (golden hour aesthetic)
Film stock emulation for warmth and grain
emphasis_on: Natural beauty captured with technical mastery
